summary: In his spectacular film debut, young Babar, King of the Elephants, must save his homeland from certain destruction by Rataxes and his band of invading rhinos.
cast: Gordon Pinsent|Elizabeth Hanna|Lisa Jai|Marsha Moreau|Bobby Becken|Amos Crawley|Gavin Magrath|Sarah Polley|Stephen Ouimette|Chris Wiggins|John Stocker|Charles Kerr|Stuart Stone|Carl Banas|Ray Landry|Angela Fusco|Christopher Andrade|Chris Britton|Scott Brunt|Jason Burke|Katie Coristine|Barbara Mantini|Frank Perry|Chris Robson|Norm Spencer|Lea-Helen Weir|Bernard Alane|Christian Alers|Véronique Alycia|Max André|Jacques Balutin|Vincent Barazoni|Nelly Benedetti|Aurelia Bruno|Stanley Claisse|Jean-Pierre Darras|Régis Ivanov|Henri Labussière|Brigitte Lecordier|Marie-Eugénie Maréchal|Christian Pelissier|Marie Vincent|Molly Johnson
keywords: self confidence|rescue mission|king|elephant|friends who live together
title: Babar en la selva
